product_name: Nescafé Classic Coffee, 200g Stabilo Pack: Amazon.in: Amazon Pantry

reviews.review_title: How is Amazon Retail able to get away with this?
reviews.review_body: I didn't take the complaints in the reviews seriously (it is hard enough to distinguish fake from real reviews as it is) and ordered the pack anyway.But right from holding the pack in hand to pouring it in an empty Nescafe 200 g bottle one cannot miss the fact that it is nowhere close to 200 g as advertised.Unless it is a particularly heavy kind of coffee, the amount of volume is not comparable to 200 g of Nescafe classic.And if  this volume IS really 200 g then it makes me worry whether I am getting a real or fake product! One of them has got to be!And this brings me to my main concern. Am I going to ingest something which is a fake?
Cheating  in 200gms packing,  received  150gm instead  of 200gm

Not worth, might not be original, only 100-150gms of coffee powder is there but packet says 200gms. I have put the contents in a 200gms Nescafe classic bottle. Only half of it is filled with this packet.

reviews.review_title: When it comes to instant Cafe nescafe classic is the best
reviews.review_body: When it comes to instant Cafe nescafe classic is the best. Sinr when try Bru, Tata Grand or anything else.

reviews.review_title: A descent coffee since no competition in price segment
reviews.review_body: It's a decent everyday coffee, you will not love it if you a coffee fan and know what a good coffee tastes like, just a product to have coffee when you you have low budget also the same level of expectations.
Its a fake product, its packet shows thar it has 200g of coffee but when i pour it in 200g jar bottle it fill only 2/3 of jar. Very disappointing
I really disappointed ☹️ buying the pouch of nescafe (200g) because of the same jar of nescafe being empty when full pouch drain on the jar of nescafe (200g).
Product quality was good and seller has send recent packing product only so was more satisfy...
